sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 13, 2026 –

Bucks Run will be groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.
Will be open February 14th & February 15th weather permitting. Trails are groomed.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Fresh groom this morning for the skate deck & classic tracks. Exceptional conditions!!!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Attempted an early morning classic ski on the golf course.  Iceland!   Lot of grass burning through too.  Don’t bother.  Skate deck was ice as well. I expect the woodland trails to be very dicey.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m. There is a special night ski session this Sunday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a beautiful ski day. The snow surface is machine groomed and in immaculate condition thanks to some fresh snow over the last few days, sustained cold, and the meticulous work of our expert Grooming Crew. All terrain and XC trails are open with mid-winter conditions. The high temperature should go just above freezing today with a breeze from the Southwest. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is Clam Chowder. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
